input: Analyze this receipt image and extract all transaction details
output:
{
  "type": "image",
  "format": "receipt",
  "description": "A retail store receipt showing multiple items purchased",
  "extracted_text": "STORE NAME\n123 Main Street\nDate: 01/15/2024 Time: 14:32\n\nItem 1 - Milk 2%     $3.99\nItem 2 - Bread       $2.49\nItem 3 - Eggs dozen  $4.29\n\nSubtotal: $10.77\nTax (8%): $0.86\nTotal: $11.63\n\nPaid: VISA ****1234",
  "structured_data": {
    "merchant_name": "STORE NAME",
    "merchant_address": "123 Main Street",
    "date": "2024-01-15",
    "time": "14:32",
    "items": [
      {"description": "Milk 2%", "amount": 3.99},
      {"description": "Bread", "amount": 2.49},
      {"description": "Eggs dozen", "amount": 4.29}
    ],
    "subtotal": 10.77,
    "tax_rate": 0.08,
    "tax_amount": 0.86,
    "total": 11.63,
    "payment_method": "VISA",
    "card_last_four": "1234"
  },
  "entities": [
    {"type": "organization", "value": "STORE NAME"},
    {"type": "date", "value": "2024-01-15"},
    {"type": "amount", "value": "11.63", "label": "total"}
  ],
  "tags": ["receipt", "retail", "grocery", "purchase"],
  "confidence": 0.94
}

input: Extract all form fields from this job application PDF

output:
{

  "structured_data": {
    "invoice_number": "INV-2024-00123",

      "address": "456 Business Ave, Suite 100",
      "city": "New York",
      "state": "NY",

    },
